name: Caves Explorer
description:
Explore the caves, collect stars and find the exit for each cave!

Controls 

A/D -> move left/right

space->jump

A small 2d platformer that I made around 2015 to tryout the then new 2d platform physics. 

It should load max stars for each level from high score save file and display them in load level screen.

It doesnt have sound.

There was a bug in the webgl build (bee library error)
